physical_appearance: This is a set of six lace strips. They are of varying lengths and design. They each feature a repeated scrolling pattern. Some are slightly stained.
sgcool_label_text: There are 6 strips of lace of varying lengths and design. The making of bobbin lace was an established tradition in port cities like Malacca and Palembang by the early 20th century. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of materials used in the making of kebayas and baju panjangs.
title_text: A Group of 6 Laces Six lace strips
